name: Bounty of the Pumpkin Planet
description:
🎃 Build a colony on the pumpkin planet, and survive until additional resources and colonists arrive!

👩‍🌾 Adopt an agricultural approach, or industrialize the planet with factories and mines.

👽 Trade with aliens from surrounding colonies - or go to war with them!

⏱ Short and sweet turn-based strategy, with lots of decision-making packed into 10-15 minutes of gameplay.

🎹 Dynamic soundtrack, that changes over time based on your playstyle.

Submission to the Pursing Pixels game jam in May 2022.

Music by the talented Devin Nelson!

Disclaimer from the developer: I knew I would be busy during the final weekend of the jam, so I started working a little early. I spent no longer than 9 hours in the week preceding the jam, and finished up my game in only 3 days during jam week. Sorry!

Built using my open-source HTML5 Itch Template.
